name: Air Domain
descr: You can manipulate lightning, mist, and wind- resistant to electricity damage.

name: Animal Domain
descr: You can speak with and befriend animals with ease.

name: Artifice Domain
descr: You can repair damage to objects, animate objects with life, and create creatures from nothing.

name: Chaos Domain
descr: Your touch infuses life and weapons with chaos, and you revel in all things anarchic.

name: Charm Domain
descr: You can baffle and befuddle foes with a touch or a smile, and your beauty and grace are divine.

name: Community Domain
descr: Your touch can heal wounds and your presence instills unity and strengthens emotional bonds.

name: Darkness Domain
descr: You manipulate shadows and darkness.

name: Death Domain
descr: You can cause the living to bleed at a touch, and find comfort in the presence of the dead.

name: Destruction Domain
descr: You revel in ruin and devastation, and can deliver particularly destructive attacks.

name: Earth Domain
descr: You have mastery over earth, metal, and stone, can fire darts of acid, and command earth creatures.

name: Evil Domain
descr: You are sinister and cruel, and have wholly pledged your soul to the cause of evil.

name: Fire Domain
descr: You can call forth fire, command creatures of the inferno, and your flesh does not burn.

name: Glory Domain
descr: You are infused with the glory of the divine, and are a true foe of the undead.

name: Good Domain
descr: You have pledged your life and soul to goodness and purity.

name: Healing Domain
descr: Your touch staves off pain and death, and your healing magic is particularly vital and potent.

name: Knowledge Domain
descr: You are a scholar and a sage of legends.

name: Law Domain
descr: You follow a strict and orgered code of laws, and in so doing, achieve enlightenment.

name: Liberation Domain
descr: You are a spirit of freedom and a staunch foe against all who would enslave and oppress.

name: Luck Domain
descr: You are infused with luck, and your mere presence can spread good fortune

name: Madness Domain
descr: You embrace the madness that lurks deep in your heart, and can unleash it to drive your foes insane or to sacrifice certain abilities to hone others.

name: Magic Domain
descr: You are a true student of all things mystical, and see divinity in the purity of magic.

name: Nobility Domain
descr: You are a great leader, an inspiration to all who follow the teachings of your faith.

name: Plant Domain
descr: You find solace in the green, can grow defensive thorns, and can communicate with plants.

name: Protection Domain
descr: Your faith is your greatest source of protection, and you can use that faith to defend others.

name: Repose Domain
descr: You see death not as something to be feared, but as a final rest and reward for a life well spent. The taint of undeath is a mockery of what you hold dear.

name: Rune Domain
descr: In strange and eldritch runes you find potent magic.

name: Strength Domain
descr: In strength andn brawn there is truth- your faith gives you incredible might and power.

name: Sun Domain
descr: You see truth in the pure and burning light of the sun, and can call upon its blessing or wrath to work great deeds.

name: Travel Domain
descr: You are an explorer and find enlightenment in the simple joy of travel, bet it by foot or conveyance or magic.

name: Trickery Domain
descr: You are a master of illusions and deceptions.

name: War Domain
descr: You are a crusader for your god, always ready and willing to fight to defend your faith.

name: Water Domain
descr: You can manipulate water and mist and ice, conjure creatures of water, and resist cold.

name: Weather Domain
descr: With powers over storm and sky, you can call down the wrath of the gods upon the world below.
